website_summaries.verdict: A solid secondary valve that's adequate in the short term, but may not be reliable enough for serious divers.
pros: Lightweight and compact, not as bulky as others on the market
Long hose and swivel end allows convenient use from right or left side
cons: Does require some added force to breathe through
May start to flood and make noises while in use

customer_reviews.title: I like to occasionally use my alternate for a few minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: I like to occasionally use my alternate for a few minutes while diving to make sure that it works. After less than 20 dives with this thing, it started flooding a bit while breathing making weird noises. Yes, it works, but your alternate air source is for an emergency and having a partially flooded reg could add to the stress/ panic of the out of air diver. Also not the easiest thing to breathe from, does require some force. I wouldn't recommend this to any serious diver.
customer_reviews.author: Metalhead

customer_reviews.title: This is good gear. It punches the ticket for an octo
customer_reviews.text: This is good gear. It punches the ticket for an octo, and should do its job, just fine. (It does have a tendency to try to free flow with age, and use... but we all know how to fix that, or( we all damn well should.) I am only giving the 4 stars, because of price... I think it's a little high, for no more than what it does... however... If it has to be used for its intended purpose?... then it worth it's weight in gold. I would, and will buy again, and I would reccomend to a friend who asked. most likely..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: The Mares MV Octopus Diving Regulator is exactly as described and works great for it's purpose. It did free flow in my octo clip on my check-out dive, so I just rearranged my clips to place mouthpiece down and was no longer an issue. I bought this for our recent dive trip to Fiji and it worked great - I checked it multiple times during our week stay with 16 total dives going from my reg to alternate. Overall, I love this product and how compact it is. I would definitely recommend and buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable. Leaks air. waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I went diving with this Regulator once. 2nd dive I went to do it was leaking air. had to cancel my dive :(. spend a little more. Mares is crap!
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA

customer_reviews.title: Great Octo at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great Octo at a great price, breathes as easy as it should and doesn't free flow on the surface. Economical price, works as expected and long hose makes it great to be able to hand off as a spare. It breathes a little wet, but as a Octo it does everything I would want it to
customer_reviews.author: Jason Borkland

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty much a Dacor regulator
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much a Dacor regulator. It breathes a lot like my old Dacor Viper. I like it a lot. Sometimes use my Octo instead of my regulator... :)
customer_reviews.author: Decker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Reliable and robust. I depend on Mares regulators. This is an easy breathing alternative (secondary) regulator. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JRTLLOYD

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy valve cover falls off easily
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these for family use. The cap on the exhale valve on both units fell off after the first dive, leaving the valve exposed. Can't get a hold of mares customer service for this matter.
customer_reviews.author: By the Seller

customer_reviews.title: Small, light, and works just like it should
customer_reviews.text: Just as it is described. What else would you want? The unit is surpassingly light but does everything you need it to do. Did not jam, or free-flow, even though it was exposed to lots of fine and course sand in the surf during many days of diving in Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great octo with a much lower profile than the usual round octo's which makes it less bulky.
customer_reviews.author: TRis

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this product & its price
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly, very happy with this product & its price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Octo
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this a second time, this one for my daughter. Highly recommended for its quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: John Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Manual has many languages except ENGLISH!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent but the manual has every language under the sun except english, this is very upsetting
customer_reviews.author: Lee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great octo
customer_reviews.text: Great for an octo breaths a little wet but great backup
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend and she is very happy with the light weight and compact design
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Great Octo
customer_reviews.text: Love this for the same reasons as the Viper 12S--it's small, light, breathes easily. I am very satisfied with this Octopus.
customer_reviews.author: RH McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect octopus to be able to use for yourself AND ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect octopus to be able to use for yourself AND by somebody in front of you without twisting it. Just rotate it : AWESOME !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item works great. Other than the fact that it is octopus, it is a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Iaciofano

customer_reviews.title: he was very happy to be breathing
customer_reviews.text: This guy is okay. It breathes when you need it, and that's all that really matters. My dive buddy needed it on my second dive with it, he was very happy to be breathing. On the con side, it bubbles a bit in certain positions. So, you can't just clip it anywhere. The bung that comes with it is a nice idea, but I found it coming loose a few times on my first dive. All and all, I am happy with my purchase. Good price, works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Exactly what i hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Exactly what i hoped for. Shipped fast and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Octo
customer_reviews.text: My wife has made two dives with it. She loves it. There have been no free flow problems that some others have reported. A great Octo for any level of recreational diver.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly after 2 dives
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and it broke after 2 uses I have contacted the seller and am waiting to hear back. I will update ASAP
customer_reviews.author: ktrjcool

customer_reviews.title: Mares MV Octopus
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately I haven't had to use this yet but I have tried it. It comes with a nice long hose and with the swivel end can be used by your buddy from either left or right very conveniently. Seems like it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: terrible.
customer_reviews.text: All you need for an octupus. Do not buy their primary regulator in the design though..terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Porra Louca

product_meta.title: Mares MV Octopus Diving Regulator
feature_bullets: Lightweight with a minimalist compact design
Ambidextrous design for ease of use
Durable with superior resistance to abrasion
Low pressure center area for easy breathing
